Package cryptos.currencies

Class CryptocurrencyStreamer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cryptos.currencies.CryptocurrencyStreamer

  • public class CryptocurrencyStreamer
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for streaming Cryptocurrency objects from the All the Coins end point
    and cryptocurrency to fiat prices from the Multiple Symbols Price end point.
    Since:
    Cryptos4J v1.0
    Author:
    Matt - mcfadd
    See Also:
    Cryptocurrency

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CryptocurrencyStreamer​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.util.stream.Stream<Cryptocurrency> streamAllCurrencies​()
      streams all Cryptocurrency objects by connecting to the All the Coins end point.
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.Double> streamCryptoPrice​(java.lang.String[] cryptosFrom, java.lang.String... fiatsTo)
      streams multiple Cryptocurrency/fiat pair prices in the order in which they are listed by connecting to the Multiple Symbols Price end point.
      static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.Double> streamCryptoPrice​(java.lang.String cryptoFrom, java.lang.String... fiatsTo)
      streams Cryptocurrency fiat prices in the order in which the fiats are listed by connecting to the Single Symbol Price end point.
      static java.util.stream.Stream<Cryptocurrency> streamCurrencies​(java.lang.String... symbols)
      streams Cryptocurrency objects in the order given by connecting to the All the Coins end point.

    • Method Detail

      • streamCurrencies

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<Cryptocurrency> streamCurrencies​(java.lang.String... symbols)
        streams Cryptocurrency objects in the order given by connecting to the All the Coins end point.
        Parameters:
        symbols - array of Cryptocurrency symbols to stream
        Returns:
        stream of Cryptocurrency objects
        Since:
        Cryptos4J v1.0

      • streamAllCurrencies

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<Cryptocurrency> streamAllCurrencies​()
        streams all Cryptocurrency objects by connecting to the All the Coins end point.
        Returns:
        stream of all Cryptocurrency objects
        Since:
        Cryptos4J v.10

      • streamCryptoPrice

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.Double> streamCryptoPrice​(java.lang.String cryptoFrom,
                                                                          java.lang.String... fiatsTo)
        streams Cryptocurrency fiat prices in the order in which the fiats are listed by connecting to the Single Symbol Price end point.
        Parameters:
        cryptoFrom - cryptocurrency symbol to convert from
        fiatsTo - array of fiat currencies to convert to
        Returns:
        stream of fiat prices
        Since:
        Cryptos4J v1.0

      • streamCryptoPrice

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.Double> streamCryptoPrice​(java.lang.String[] cryptosFrom,
                                                                          java.lang.String... fiatsTo)
        streams multiple Cryptocurrency/fiat pair prices in the order in which they are listed by connecting to the Multiple Symbols Price end point.
        Parameters:
        cryptosFrom - array of cryptocurrency symbols to convert from
        fiatsTo - array of fiat currencies to convert to
        Returns:
        stream of fiat prices
        Since:
        Cryptos4J v1.0
